name: Girls und Panzer: Dream Tank Match DX
overview: Girls und Panzer: Dream Tank Match DX for the Nintendo Switch is an enhanced version of the PlayStation 4 version Girls und Panzer: Dream Tank Match and includes 4 new characters from the das FINALE Episode 1 (Freedom Academy's Mary, Andou, Oshida, and Ogin of Oarai Girls' Academy's TEAM-SHARK), three new tanks (MK.IV, Renault FT-17, S35, and ARL 44), a new offline tournament-style game mode (Panzerfahren Festival mode), various 3D-modelled Tank Commanders and the addition of multiplayer matches for up to 8 players on local communication.
